title: Gift alert: These waterproof and wireless Bluetooth earbuds are only $69.97
content:
Macworld

While the cheer and joy of the holidays are approaching, so is the frenzy that is gift shopping for loved ones. Gifts for techies can be pricey, but they don’t have to be with these innovative waterproof and Bluetooth earbuds.

Now through October 31st, you can get the xFyro xS2 Waterproof Wireless Earphones for only $69.97 (reg. $249). The price is so right that you might have to pick them up for yourself!

These seamless headphones feature IP67 waterproofing, making them perfectly suitable for wear even in inclement weather and while working out. They utilize Bluetooth CSR 4.2 for a great connection that’s lag-free and will let you enjoy your music on the go. Plus, the proprietary noise-isolating silicone structure helps to eliminate external noise, giving users a rich euphony of sound.

The xFyro earbuds are stored in a sleek, compact carrying tube that also acts as a power bank to keep your buds charged. They only need 2 hours of charging to reach full power and offer up to 300 hours of standby time!

No wonder The Gadget Flow wrote, “The ease of use, build quality, audio quality, and added convenience make the xFyro xS2 a very compelling choice.”

Gift innovative, affordable tech to loved ones when you get the xFyro xS2 Waterproof Wireless Earphones for just $69.97 through October 31st at 11:59pm Pacific. No coupon required!
